title: Effect of multiplying and adding on variance

content.question: Each value in a sample has been transformed by multiplying by 3 and then adding 10. If the original sample had a variance of 4, what is the variance of the transformed sample?

topic.text: 1.7: Summary Statistics for a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Calculate summary statistics, relative positions of points within a distribution, correlation, and predicted response.
